accountId.description: Account ID associated with the entity

PaymentEntity.description: Payment entity information used in ACH transactions

category.description: Category of the merchant (e.g., Coffee Shop, Restaurant)

Merchant.description: Merchant information involved in a transaction

withdrawal.description: Maximum withdrawal limit, can be null if not applicable

purchase.description: Maximum purchase limit, can be null if not applicable

accountId.description: ID of the account associated with the card

entityId.description: Entity ID associated with the card

status.description: Status of the card (e.g., ACTIVE, INACTIVE)

expirationDate.description: Card expiration date in MM/YY format

creatorId.description: ID of the person/system that created the card

context.description: Context in which the card is used

Card.description: Card details associated with a transaction or user

referenceId.description: External or reference ID associated with the transaction

accountId.description: Account ID involved in the transaction

entityId.description: Entity ID associated with the transaction

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the transaction was created

context.description: Context or system source of the transaction

purchaseTransactionId.description: Unique identifier for the purchase transaction

referenceId.description: External or reference ID associated with the transaction

accountId.description: Account ID involved in the transaction

entityId.description: Entity ID associated with the transaction

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the transaction was created

context.description: Context or system source of the transaction
